programme.title: Relaes de Famlia, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um homem que se sente enterrado sob uma montanha de dvidas cria uma ligao inesperada com um jovem em uma agncia de cobrana enquanto ambos lutam para se libertar de dvidas, tanto financeiras quanto emocionais.

programme.title: Vale dos Deuses, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: A abundncia contrasta com a pobreza em trs narrativas separadas, apresentando um escritor de classe mdia, um trilionrio excntrico e uma comunidade Navajo em dificuldades.

programme.title: Jovens e Rebeldes, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Como a maioria dos adolescentes, Culain, Enica, Julian e Sego devem lidar com presses de outros jovens, bullying, problemas com os pais e, claro, amores no correspondidos. Mas eles tambm vivem sob o domnio opressivo do Imprio Romano.

programme.title: Apex, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Cinco caadores pagam para caar um homem em uma ilha deserta, e acabam se tornando a presa.

programme.title: Donnie Darko, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Donnie Darko no se d bem com sua famlia, seus professores ou seus colegas de classe, mas acaba encontrando uma amiga em Gretchen. Seu outro amigo, porm, no to confivel assim: trata-se de Frank, um coelho gigante que s ele pode ver.

programme.title: Departamento Q - O Efeito Marco, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um detetive e seu assistente investigam a histria de um menino de 12 anos que est desaparecido. Ao comearem as buscas, descobrem uma rede de corrupo internacional utilizando os fundos do governo destinados ao desenvolvimento da frica.

programme.title: Bons pra Cachorro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Almndega e Cassie, dois ces de estimao, precisam superar suas diferenas para evitar que ladres assaltem a casa dos seus donos.

programme.title: O Radico, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Tommy vem de uma famlia de skatistas, mas nunca conseguiu aprender a se equilibrar nas rodas. Quando um valento da cidade o desafia para uma competio, a nica esperana do adolescente obter ajuda de seu cachorro skatista.

programme.title: A rvore da Vida, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Histria de uma tpica famlia americana dos anos 50, formada por um casal e trs filhos. A rgida educao, o ambiente e o passado ainda permeiam a vida de Jack, o filho mais velho, que na vida adulta tenta se reconciliar com o pai.

programme.title: Rebecca est enganada em acreditar que o av de Yugi roubou o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis do av dela. Yugi precisa defender o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis para ensinar a ela que o que conta no o poder das cartas, mas o corao delas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A junta de diretores desonestos da KaibaCorp prende Kaiba dentro de um jogo de realidade virtual! Mokuba recruta Yugi e Joey para libertar Kaiba desse jogo sem igual, no qual perder equivale a morrer!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A misso para resgatar Kaiba continua com uma ajudinha de... Mai? Mas ser que Yugi e seus amigos se adaptaro a um mundo virtual em que as regras e estratgias mudam a toda hora?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos resgatam Kaiba, mas ainda esto presos no jogo! A nica sada requer enfrentar o Drago de Cinco Cabeas, mas Joey, Mokuba e Mai perdem todos os seus pontos de vida no difcil duelo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Um novo aluno, Duke Devlin, derrota Joey em um jogo de Duel Monsters, forando Joey a ser seu servo. Duke fora Joey a usar um uniforme de cachorro e o humilha em pblico, forando Yugi a desafiar Duke para um duelo.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Em troca da liberdade de Joey, Yugi concorda em desistir de Duel Monsters para sempre se ele perder. Sem conhecer bem as regras, Yugi comea mal. As chances dele no melhoram, e Duke revela que criou Monstros dos Dados-Masmorra com a ajuda de Pegasus!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi usa suas habilidades de jogo natas para virar a mesa contra Duke, mas Duke menciona mais uma regra: todas as criaturas ocupam territrio no tabuleiro-grade.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Depois que o todo-poderoso Orgoth, o Implacvel de Duke deixa toda a esquadra de monstros de Yugi em pedaos, Yugi s tem mais um turno antes de perder todos os seus pontos de vida!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Um cartomante arcano rouba o Enigma do Milnio, e Yugi precisa defend-lo em um duelo para recuper-lo! No entanto, no se trata de um simples advinho. Ele um inimigo familiar e formidvel do Reino dos Duelistas. Ou talvez no?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A misteriosa ameaa que controla Bandit Keith estilhaa o Enigma do Milnio antes de atear fogo na arena de duelos! Ser que Yugi consegue remontar o Enigma do Milnio e salvar o esprito antes que tudo seja engolido pelas chamas?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A origem de Duel Monsters revelada! Usando a mgica do Colar do Milnio, a historiadora egpcia Ishizu Ishtar mostra a Kaiba como Duel Monsters era jogado milnios atrs!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: O esprito do Enigma do Milnio percebe que suas memrias do Egito antigo se esvaram, mas Ta o ajudar a descobrir os mistrios de seu passado! No entanto, a busca deles interrompida pelo duelista danarino Johnny Steps e seus monstros do rock!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi descobre que era um fara poderoso que salvou o mundo 5.000 anos atrs e agora deve salv-lo de novo! No meio-tempo, Kaiba testa os poderes de Obelisco, o Atormentador, do Deck dos Deuses Egpcios, contra a fria do Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Joey forado a entrar num duelo e pode perder seu precioso Drago Negro de Olhos Vermelhos para os Caadores Raros. Embora Joey esmague seus inimigos com sua poderosa armada de monstros, eliminar pontos de vida no o nico caminho para a vitria...

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Hackers, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: A neophyte hacker becomes the target of the FBI after he unknowingly taps into a high-tech embezzling scheme which could cause a horrific environmental disaster in this suspenseful drama.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Science fiction)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A trio of American astronauts become instant heroes as they plant the Stars and Stripes on Mars before beginning the voyage home. But back on their ship, something else has set its sights on Earth, something whose relatives have already paid us a visit.

programme.title: Species III, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the ongoing fight for supremacy between mankind and the human-alien hybrids, a fatal hybrid weakness has given humans the advantage. Until now.

programme.title: Species: The Awakening, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When Miranda Hollander suffers a strange blackout, she learns her true origin as a human-alien hybrid and becomes locked in battle with other hybrids. But time is running outwill she surrender to her own killer instincts in the search for a mate?

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: 3022, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Halfway through a 10 year mission in deep space, a group of astronauts awaken to find Earth has suffered a catastrophic event. The already unstable crew desperately races to repair their deteriorating space station and fight off unforeseen threats.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: The Hills Run Red, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: A man recently released from a five-year prison sentence seeks vengeance against the former friend who has violated his trust and sought his death. Starring Thomas Hunter, Henry Silva, and Dan Duryea.

programme.title: The Cowboy and the Lady, (1938, Western)
programme.desc: A lonely socialite masquerades as a maid and meets an unpretentious, plain-spoken cowboy who is unaware of her true identity.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Support Your Local Gunfighter, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: James Garner is back in the saddle again as hustler Latigo Smith whose latest con is passing off cowhand Jug (Jack Elam) as the dreaded gunman Swifty Morgan. But when the real Swifty shows up, the Wild West is going to get a whole lot wackier!

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter, (1964, Western)
programme.desc: Screen legend Yul Brynner turns in a magnificent performance as a gunfighter who must do battle with his most formidable adversary - his own conscience - in this gripping, double-barreled western full of surprise twists and colorful villainy.

programme.title: Apache Country, (1952, Western)
programme.desc: Cavalry scouts Gene Autry & Pat Buttram are ordered to break up a ring which uses raids to cover up its activities. Carolina Cotton assists Gene and Pat, while seeking revenge against the gang leader.

programme.title: Barbed Wire, (1952, Western)
programme.desc: In 1878, Gene Autry is a cattle buyer who tries to settle a battle between the cattlemen and homesteaders, when the latter are worked up into a feverish pitch by unscrupulous landowner Steve Rutledge.

programme.title: Kit Carson, (1940, Western)
programme.desc: Indian fighter, trapper, and frontier scout Kit Carson leads a wagon train of settlers from Fort Bridger, along the Oregon Trail through Shoshone territory, to California, which plans to secede from Mexico.

programme.title: Cariboo Trail, (1950, Western)
programme.desc: Montanans Jim Redfern and Mike Evans head into Canada's British Columbia via the Cariboo Trail intent to raise cattle and dig for gold but find trouble instead.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow, (2004, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When mysterious giant robots begin attacking the streets of New York City, intrepid reporter Polly Perkins is on the story and enlists the aid of ace aviator and old flame Joseph 'Sky Captain' Sullivan.

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: Heist, (2001, Heist Films)
programme.desc: A jewel thief's nephew is sent along on a heist to ensure a longtime partner in crime stays honest about the division of the loot.

programme.title: Before The Devil Knows You're Dead, (2007, Crime)
programme.desc: Andy, an overextended payroll executive, lures his younger brother, Hank, into a larcenous scheme: the pair will rob a suburban mom-and-pop jewelry store that appears to be the quintessential easy target.

programme.title: The Way of the Gun, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A pair of bumbling criminals kidnap a woman for ransom money, but they soon realize they've made a huge mistake when they learn she is a surrogate for a ruthless mob boss.

programme.title: Into the Blue, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Young vacationers, expecting to have a memorable time diving, find themselves in deep trouble with a druglord when they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.

Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: For Lieutenant Pete "Maverick" Mitchell and his friend and co-pilot Nick "Goose" Bradshaw, being accepted into an elite training school for fighter pilots is a dream come true. But a tragedy will threaten Petes dreams of becoming an ace pilot.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick (2022)
programme.desc: Pete "Maverick" Mitchell keeps pushing the envelope after years of service as one of the Navys top aviators. He must soon confront the past while training a new squad of graduates for a dangerous mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Patriots Day (2016)
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombings, police Sgt. Tommy Saunders, FBI Special Agent Richard DesLauriers and Commissioner Ed Davis join survivors, first responders and other investigators in a race against time to find the suspects.

programme.title: Paid in Full (2002)
programme.desc: A dry cleaners delivery boy becomes one of the most powerful drug dealers in 1980s Harlem. Based on a true story.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)
programme.desc: On assignment in war-torn Europe, Navy SEALs discover gold at the bottom of a lake -- a fortune rumored to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. When the enemy detects the team, the SEALs are left with only 10 hours to recover the treasure.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: All Up in the Biz (2023)
programme.desc: Celebrity interviews and rare archival footage provide insight into the life and legacy of hip-hop icon Biz Markie.

programme.title: Norbit (2007)
programme.desc: Though married to a terrible shrew, a man (Eddie Murphy) tries to figure out a way to be with his childhood sweetheart (Thandie Newton), who has just moved back into town.

programme.title: The Longest War
programme.desc: The human stories and drama behind Americas involvement in Afghanistan, now the longest war in U.S. history; features interviews with intelligence operatives, soldiers, families, Afghan officials, journalists, and government and military officials.

programme.title: Ready for War (2019)
programme.desc: Thousands of immigrants volunteer to serve in the U.S. military -- but then find themselves deported once their tours of duty are over.

programme.title: Serpico (1973)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD.

programme.title: Chuck (2016)
programme.desc: Liquor salesman and part-time prizefighter Chuck Wepner gets the chance to take on Muhammad Ali in a highly publicized title fight, launching him to sudden fame.

programme.title: Fighting (2009)
programme.desc: A scam artist (Terrence Howard) introduces a young man (Channing Tatum) to New Yorks bare-knuckle street-fighting circuit.

programme.title: Danger Close (2019)
programme.desc: Australian and New Zealand soldiers face overwhelming odds as they fight for their lives during the Battle of Long Tan in Vietnam.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: The Machinist (2004)
programme.desc: Cryptic notes and encounters with a mysterious stranger torment a drill-press operator (Christian Bale) who has not slept in a year.

programme.title: The Crow (1994)
programme.desc: A black bird resurrects a rock musician (Brandon Lee) who then avenges his own murder and his fiancees.

programme.title: American Selfie: One Nation Shoots Itself
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi captures a snapshot of America as the country faces a pandemic, a presidential election and a costly financial collapse.

programme.title: The Honey Trap: A True Story of Love, Lies and the FBI
programme.desc: The story of Denis Cuspert, aka Deso Dogg, and his journey from infamous German rapper to ISIS recruiter; exploring the circular relationship between propaganda, recruitment and the soft power of entertainment culture.

programme.title: Murder Company (2024)
programme.desc: During the D-Day invasion, a group of U.S. soldiers must smuggle a member of the French resistance behind enemy lines to assassinate a high-value Nazi target.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis (2002)
programme.desc: The crew (Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner) of the Enterprise must prevent a replica of Capt. Picard (Patrick Stewart) from overtaking Earth.

programme.title: Love and Monsters (2020)
programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: Fatman (2020)
programme.desc: After receiving a lump of coal in his stocking, a disgruntled 12-year-old hires a highly skilled assassin to kill Santa Claus.

programme.title: Shaft (2000)
programme.desc: A detective (Samuel L. Jackson) and a narcotics cop (Vanessa L. Williams) track a sociopath out to kill a woman who can testify that he committed murder.

programme.title: No Country for Old Men (2007)
programme.desc: An aging lawman (Tommy Lee Jones) reflects on his past and laments a changing world while trying to find and protect a hunter who took the cash from a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: Eagle Eye (2008)
programme.desc: Two strangers (Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan) become pawns of a mysterious woman who threatens their friends and family and uses technology to control their actions.

programme.title: Disturbia (2007)
programme.desc: Under house arrest, a troubled youth (Shia LaBeouf) is unsure if his neighbor (David Morse) is really a serial killer or if his suspicions are the result of a captive and overactive imagination.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 2 (1997)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Scream 3 (2000)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative is tracked down by a young woman and they become entangled in an unauthorized black ops program.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible (1996)
